author: Alex Sherman
title: Disney executive Geoff Morrell, who helped craft response to Dont Say Gay law, leaves company after three months

author: Alex Sherman
title: Disney executive Geoff Morrell, who helped craft response to Dont Say Gay law, leaves company after three months

sentence: Disneys opposition to Florida legislation banning discussion of sexual orientation and gender identity in classrooms with kids third grade and younger prompted Governor Ron DeSantis and other Republicans to terminate a special municipal district the company has operated in Florida since the 1960s.
author: Christopher Palmeri
title: Disney Replaces Public Relations Chief Amid Florida Furor
